name: Grace Muthoni
text: Dr. Ken transformed my smile with veneers. The results exceeded my expectations, and his team made me feel comfortable throughout the process.

name: James Ochieng
text: I was nervous about getting implants, but the procedure was painless. My new teeth look completely natural. Highly recommend Best Dental.

name: Sarah Njeri
text: The teeth whitening treatment gave me amazing results in just one session. Professional service and a beautiful, modern clinic.

name: Peter Kamau
text: My daughter's braces journey was handled with such care. The team explained everything clearly and the results are perfect.
